verses.verse: Now Joshua <WH3091> was old <WH2204> and well stricken <WH935> in years <WH3117>; and Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him <WH2204>, Thou art old and well stricken <WH935> in years <WH3117>, and there remaineth <WH7604> yet very <WH3966> much <WH7235> land <WH776> to be possessed <WH3423>.
This is the land <WH776> that yet remaineth <WH7604>: all the regions <WH1552> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and all the Geshurites <WH1651>;

from the Shihor <WH7883>, which is before <WH6440> Egypt <WH4714>, even unto the border <WH1366> of Ekron <WH6138> northward <WH6828>, which is reckoned <WH2803> to the Canaanites <WH3669>; the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>; the Gazites <WH5841>, and the Ashdodites <WH796>, the Ashkelonites <WH832>, the Gittites <WH1663>, and the Ekronites <WH6139>; also the Avvim <WH5761>,

on the south <WH8486>; all the land <WH776> of the Canaanites <WH3669>, and Mearah <WH4632> that belongeth to the Sidonians <WH6722>, unto Aphek <WH663>, to the border <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567>;

and the land <WH776> of the Gebalites <WH1382>, and all Lebanon <WH3844>, toward the sunrising <WH4217>, from Baal-gad <WH1171> under mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768> unto the entrance <WH935> of Hamath <WH2574>;

all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the hill-country <WH2022> from Lebanon <WH3844> unto Misrephoth-maim <WH4956>, even all the Sidonians <WH6722>; them will I drive out <WH3423> from before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: only allot <WH5307> thou it unto Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance <WH5159>, as I have commanded thee <WH6680>.
Now therefore divide <WH2505> this land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> unto the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH7626>, and the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>.

With him the Reubenites <WH7206> and the Gadites <WH1425> received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159>, which Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> them <WH5676>, beyond the Jordan <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>, even as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068> gave them <WH5414>:

from Aroer <WH6177>, that is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769>, and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley <WH5158>, and all the plain <WH4334> of Medeba <WH4311> unto Dibon <WH1769>;
and all the cities <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, who reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon <WH2809>, unto the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>;
and Gilead <WH1568>, and the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and Maacathites <WH4602>, and all mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768>, and all Bashan <WH1316> unto Salecah <WH5548>;

all the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>, who reigned <WH4427> in Ashtaroth <WH6252> and in Edrei <WH154> (the same was left <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the Rephaim <WH7497>); for these did Moses <WH4872> smite <WH5221>, and drove them out <WH3423>.

Nevertheless the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> drove <WH3423> not out the Geshurites <WH1651>, nor the Maacathites <WH4602>: but Geshur <WH1651> and Maacath <WH4602> dwell <WH3427> in the midst <WH7130> of Israel <WH3478> unto this day <WH3117>.

Only unto the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> he gave <WH5414> no inheritance <WH5159>; the offerings <WH801> of Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, made by fire <WH801> are his inheritance <WH5159>, as he spake unto him <WH1696>.
And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> unto the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their border <WH1366> was from Aroer <WH6177>, that is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon <WH769>, and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley <WH5158>, and all the plain <WH4334> by Medeba <WH4311>;
Heshbon <WH2809>, and all its cities <WH5892> that are in the plain <WH4334>; Dibon <WH1769>, and Bamoth-baal <WH1120>, and Beth-baal <WH1010>-meon,
and Jahaz <WH3096>, and Kedemoth <WH6932>, and Mephaath <WH4158>,
and Kiriathaim <WH7156>, and Sibmah <WH7643>, and Zereth-shahar <WH6890> in the mount <WH2022> of the valley <WH6010>,
and Beth-peor <WH1047>, and the slopes of Pisgah <WH798>, and Beth-jeshimoth <WH1020>,

and all the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH4334>, and all the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, who reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon <WH2809>, whom Moses <WH4872> smote <WH5221> with the chiefs <WH5387> of Midian <WH4080>, Evi <WH189>, and Rekem <WH7552>, and Zur <WH6698>, and Hur <WH2354>, and Reba <WH7254>, the princes <WH5257> of Sihon <WH5511>, that dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776>.

Balaam <WH1109> also the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160>, the soothsayer <WH7080>, did the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> slay <WH2026> with the sword <WH2719> among the rest <WH413> of their slain <WH2491>.

And the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> was the Jordan <WH3383>, and the border <WH1366> thereof <WH5159>. This was the inheritance of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and the villages thereof <WH2691>.
And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> unto the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, unto the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, according to their families <WH4940>.

And their border <WH1366> was Jazer <WH3270>, and all the cities <WH5892> of Gilead <WH1568>, and half <WH2677> the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, unto Aroer <WH6177> that is before <WH6440> Rabbah <WH7237>;
and from Heshbon <WH2809> unto Ramath-mizpeh <WH7434>, and Betonim <WH993>; and from Mahanaim <WH4266> unto the border <WH1366> of Debir <WH1688>;

and in the valley <WH6010>, Beth-haram <WH1027>, and Beth-nimrah <WH1039>, and Succoth <WH5523>, and Zaphon <WH6829>, the rest <WH3499> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, the Jordan <WH3383> and the border <WH1366> thereof <WH7097>, unto the uttermost part of the sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and the villages thereof <WH2691>.

And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> inheritance unto the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>: and it was for the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their border <WH1366> was from Mahanaim <WH4266>, all Bashan <WH1316>, all the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, and all the towns <WH2333> of Jair <WH2971>, which are in Bashan <WH1316>, threescore <WH8346> cities <WH5892>:

and half <WH2677> Gilead <WH1568>, and Ashtaroth <WH6252>, and Edrei <WH154>, the cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>, were for the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, even for the half <WH2677> of the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> according to their families <WH4940>.
These are the inheritances <WH5157> which Moses <WH4872> distributed in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124>, beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405>, eastward <WH4217>.

But unto the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> no inheritance <WH5159>: Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, is their inheritance <WH5159>, as he spake unto them <WH1696>.
